In a new interview with ex "American Idol" judge Simon Cowell , Oprah Winfrey peels away a few layers from this complicated man she calls the world's most famous talent scout. The interview for her new network show called " Oprah Winfrey Presents Master Class" delves into Simon Cowell 's childhood and gives him a chance to reflect on why he has become so successful. digs at Tom Brady , Jets coach Rex Ryan lauded Ben Roethlisberger , noting how hard it can be to tackle the 6-foot-5, 241-pound quarterback. "I would've made him a defensive end," Rex Ryan said. Ben Roethlisberger will beat you up. I've never seen a guy take the hits he can take and also make people miss the way he doe and be as accurate on the run.
